scripts.clean-packages: npx shx rm -rf packages/**/bin && npx shx rm -rf packages/**/obj
scripts.clean-tests: npx shx rm -rf tests/bin && npx shx rm -rf tests/obj && npx shx rm -rf tests/fableBuild
scripts.clean-examples: npx shx rm -rf examples/bin && npx shx rm -rf examples/obj && npx shx rm -rf examples/fableBuild
scripts.watch-examples-webpack: cd examples && npx webpack serve --mode development
scripts.build-examples: cd examples && dotnet fable --outDir fableBuild && npx webpack --mode production
scripts.prebuild-docs: npm run clean-docs && npx shx mkdir temp && npx shx cp -R docs/assets/ temp/
scripts.watch-tests-mocha: cd tests && nodemon --watch fableBuild --delay 150ms --exec "npx mocha -r esm -r mocha.env.js --reporter dot --recursive fableBuild"
scripts.pretests: npm run clean-tests && cd tests && dotnet fable --outDir fableBuild
scripts.tests: cd tests && npx mocha -r esm -r mocha.env.js --reporter dot --recursive fableBuild
scripts.prerelease: npm run clean && npm run tests
scripts.release: npm run release-fable-form-simple-bulma-npm && npm run release-fable-form-nuget && npm run release-fable-form-simple-nuget && npm run release-fable-form-simple-bulma-nuget
